page.title: 16Sealand Youth Club
page.content: In the youth club you pay 10p to get in and it opens at 7:00pm and closes at 9:30pm.It's open three times a week Monday,Wednesday and Thursday.They have all sorts of different games like pool,cricket,football,table tennis and badminton.On every game you pay 10p deposit.When you have finished you get your 10p back.At 8:00pm the tuck shop opens and you can bring money for the tuck shop.They have an art class every Wednesday.Sometimes a member brings a guitar.On the playing field we play football matches.Mostly on Saturdays and Sundays people play cricket and rounders.Just at the bottom of the field there are some swings,a slide, a see-saw and other things. Sometimes we have 5-a-side football. Every year we have a fete on the field,sometimes a little fair comes.
